regen.absent_element: display of the controller's identity in the lead cab when call initiated by the controller
regen.new_specification: The system should display the controller's identity in the lead cab when the call is initiated by the controller.

regen.absent_element: displaying the controller's identity when the controller initiates the call
regen.new_specification: The system shall display the controller's identity in the lead cab when the controller initiates and is automatically added to the multi-driver call.

regen.absent_element: situation of displaying the controller's identity when the controller initiates the call
regen.new_specification: When the controller initiates the call, the system shall display the controller's identity in the lead cab.

label: Functional identity of the automatically added controller shall be displayed in the leading cab.
absence: display the identity of the automatically added controller
